name: Metabolic Boost
description: Increases the movement speed of Zerglings

name: Hardened Carapace
description: Raptorlings gain +10 life.

name: Adrenal Glands
description: Increases the attack speed of Raptorlings by 40%

name: Shredding Claws
description: Raptorling attacks remove their target's armor for 14 seconds.

name: Heroic Fortitude (Kerrigan)
description: Kerrigan gains +200% life and +100% life regeneration.

name: Fury
description: Kerrigan gains +10% attack speed every time she attacks, up to 50%.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Kerrigan hits 4 additional enemies for 10 damage when attacking.

name: Ability Efficiency
description: Kerrigan has reduced cost for her abilities.

name: Rapid Regeneration
description: Brood Mutalisks regenerate life quickly while out of combat.

name: Muscular Augments
description: Increases Hydralisk movement speed by 25% and their attack range by +1.

name: Frenzy
description: Hydralisks gain the Frenzy ability, increasing attack speed by 50% for 14 seconds.

name: Ancillary Carapace
description: Hydralisk gains +20 maximum life.

name: Vicious Glaive
description: Brood Mutalisk attacks bounce three additional times, hitting up to six targets. Bounces also travel farther.

name: Severing Glaive
description: Brood Mutalisks deal full damage with each weapon bounce.

name: Seismic Spines
description: Lurkers gain +3 weapon range.

name: Chitinous Plating
description: Gives +2 armor to Torrasques.

name: Burrow Charge
description: Torrasques gain the Burrow Charge ability.

name: Tissue Assimilation
description: Torrasques restore 10 life per attack, plus 2 for each additional target cleaved.

name: Porous Cartilage
description: Brood Lords move twice as fast, and gain +100 life.

name: Heroic Fortitude (Zagara)
description: Kerrigan gains +200% life and +100% life regeneration.

name: Centrifugal Hooks
description: Splitterlings gain increased movement speed.

name: Corrosive Acid
description: Splitterlings deal 100% extra damage to the primary target when exploding.

name: Rupture
description: Splitterling blast radius increased by 50%.

name: Medusa Blades
description: Zagara deals area damage while attacking.

name: Protective Cover
description: Aberrations grant 50% damage reduction to units positioned beneath them.

name: Virulent Spores
description: Scourge deal 50% of their attack damage in a small area upon death.

name: Artillery Ducts
description: Bile Launchers gain increased range.

name: Anaerobic Enhancement
description: Infested Civilians leap towards ground units.

name: Broodling Gestation
description: Infested Civilians spawn a broodling when they die.

name: Retinal Augmentation
description: Infested Marines gain +1 attack range.

name: Plagued Munitions
description: Infested Marines deal an extra 50 damage over 11 seconds to units they attack.

name: Saturated Cultures
description: Infested Diamondback Fungal Snare cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

name: Acidic Enzymes
description: Volatile Infested and Infested Siege Tanks gain +15 damage vs Armored units.

name: Rapid Hibernation
description: Infested Banshees gain the ability to burrow, regenerating 20 life per second.

name: Braced Exoskeleton
description: Infested Banshees gain +100 life.

name: Viral Contamination
description: Infested Liberators gain +100% damage against their primary target. Splash damage remains the same.

name: Pneumatized Carapace
description: Increases the movement speed of Overlords and Overseers.

name: Enhanced Mitochondria
description: Brood Queens gain +30% energy regeneration rate, and spawn with full energy.

name: Agressive Incubation
description: Infest Structure spawns 50% additional Broodlings.

name: Calcified Armor
description: Infested Bunkers gain +3 armor.

name: Infest Structure
description: Heals a friendly structure for 500 life, and spawns 40 broodlings over 14 seconds.

name: Contamination
description: Disables enemy structures (powerful structures are slowed). Lasts 20 seconds.

name: Shadow Charge
description: Centurions gain the ability to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases their movement speed.

name: Darkcoil
description: Centurions gain the ability to stun nearby enemies. Massive units are slowed. Also grants 100 shields for 7 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Allows Stalkers to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Phase Reactor
description: Stalker Blink provides Cloak, and restores 80 shields over 4 seconds.

name: Stasis Calibration
description: Oracle Stasis Ward victims may now be attacked.

name: Infest Structure
description: Heals a friendly structure for 500 life, and spawns 40 broodlings over 14 seconds.

name: Contamination
description: Disables enemy structures (powerful structures are slowed). Lasts 20 seconds.

name: Shadow Charge
description: Centurions gain the ability to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases their movement speed.

name: Darkcoil
description: Centurions gain the ability to stun nearby enemies. Massive units are slowed. Also grants 100 shields for 7 seconds.

name: Blink
description: Allows Stalkers to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Phase Reactor
description: Stalker Blink provides Cloak, and restores 80 shields over 4 seconds.

name: Shadow Fury
description: Dark Templar gain the ability to jump from target to target, dealing 20 (+15 vs. Light) damage with each jump. Hits 5 times.

name: Shadow Stride
description: Allows Dark Templar to teleport to a nearby target location.

name: Void Stasis
description: Dark Templar gain the ability to phase a unit or structure out of existence for 5 seconds.

name: Disruption Web
description: Corsairs gain the ability to create a web of energy on the ground that prevents enemy structures and ground units from attacking for 1.25 seconds.

name: Stealth Drive
description: Oracles and Corsairs become permanently cloaked.

name: Prismatic Range
description: Void Ray weapon range increases as it continues to attack.

name: Mind Control
description: Dark Archon gain the ability to take control of a targeted unit for 8 seconds. Heroic units are immune.

name: Argus Crystal
description: Dark Archons start with full energy.

name: Charge (Sentinel)
description: Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Zealots. Ability can only be used once every 7 seconds.

name: Reconstruction
description: Sentinels revive upon death. 90 second cooldown.

name: Rapid Recharging
description: Energizers and Shield Batteries gain +50% energy regeneration rate.

name: Advanced Repair Systems
description: Reconstruction Beam affects additional targets, up to a maximum of 5.

name: Optimized Ordnance
description: Defensive Structures gain +25% weapon speed.

name: Reclamation
description: Energizers gain the ability to take control of mechanical units.

name: Phasing Armor
description: Mirages become invulnerable for 1.4 seconds when attacked. 5 second cooldown.

name: Anion Pulse-Crystals (Karax)
description: Mirage gains +2 weapon range.

name: Shadow Cannon
description: Immortals gain a powerful, single-target damage ability.

name: Fortification Barrier
description: Shield Batteries gain the ability to grant a target struture a barrier that absorbs up to 100 damage for 7 seconds.

name: Extended Thermal Lance
description: Purifier Colossi gain +3 range

name: Fire Beam
description: Purifier Colossi ignite the ground when attacking, dealing an extra 150 damage over 4 seconds.

name: Repair Drones
description: Carriers gain small mechanical drones which repair mechanical units.

name: Graviton Catapult
description: Makes the Support Carrier launch interceptors more quickly. Also increases interceptor attack speed by 25%.
